feed.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Sapio Studio Payment Pool Walthrough

entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Sapio Studio Payment Pool Walthrough
entry.summary: In a recent post by Jeremy Rubin, the Sapio Studio's GUI smart contract composer for Sapio is showcased. The post contains mostly pictures, highlighting the functionality of the project. However, Rubin mentions that this part of the project could use some development assistance and invites anyone interested in pushing the frontier of bitcoin wallet functionality to contribute.
